node.excerpt:
PaperFaces portrait of @GrantLandram.

Decided to try and create a true time lapse video showing off 53’s new Pencil stylus another go.

To record the footage I used a cheap GorillaPod knockoff to mount my iPhone 5s around a floor lamp. Once attached I swung it over my desk to get a top down view…
